item.title: Kristen Stewart, Zoey Deutch, Zar Amir Ebrahimi Attend Glitzy Deauville Festival Bash Hosted by Canal+ and Chanel
item.description: The crème de la crème of French cinema, and some American stars such as Kristen Stewart and Zoey Deutch, turned up at the Deauville American Film Festival to attend a glitzy dinner hosted by Canal+ Gr

item.title: The new Dolby Vision 2 HDR standard is probably going to be controversial
item.description: It addresses two scourges of modern TV viewing—but maybe not in the way we want.

item.title: Canal+ Enters Exclusive Talks to Buy Minority Stake in French Film Studio UGC That Operates Leading Cinema Chain
item.description: Canal+ group has entered into exclusive negotiations to buy 34-percent stake in UGC, the Paris-headquartered film studio that was founded in 1971 and operates one of France’s leading cinema chai

item.title: France’s Canal+ Gets Anti-Trust Approval for Takeover of South African Pay TV Group MultiChoice
item.description: Canal + Group, the French pay TV group behind “Paddington,” has received anti-trust approval to finalize its long-gestated takeover of MultiChoice Group, the South African pay TV company.

item.title: France’s Canal+ Gets Anti-Trust Approval for Takeover of South African Pay TV Group MultiChoice
item.description: Canal + Group, the French pay TV group behind “Paddington,” has received anti-trust approval to finalize its long-gestated takeover of MultiChoice Group, the South African pay TV company.
